page.title: 09ARTS AND CRAFTS IN BROCK
page.content: BEING A RURAL AREA,COUNTRY CRAFTS ARE POPULAR AND WITH THE RECENT OPENING OF A CRAFT SHOP AT MIDDLE LICKHURST THERE IS NOW A MARKET FOR SUCH THINGS AS HAND-MADE GOLD AND SILVER JEWELLERY, WROUGHT IRON WORK AND STAINED GLASS WORK. LOCAL ARTISTS EXHIBIT PAINTINGS IN BOTH OIL AND WATER COLOURS AND HANDWORK INCLUDES A VARIETY OF APPLIQUED,EMBROIDERED AND PATCHWORK CUSHIONS AS WELL AS JUMPERS, SCARVES AND HAND DRESSED TOYS. FROM POTTERY TO DELICATELY DECORATED GOOSE EGGS AND FROM HAND MADE TOYS TO HOME_MADE JAMS AND SWEETS THERE IS A GROWING LIST OF INTERESTING ARTICLES FOR SALE.
